_header: Such semblant Christ shall maken to thee above
_description: The reward for following Christ — one couplet translating ‘Tali wultu respiciet te Dominus ea que facis cum quali facis’ which precedes it in John Grimestone’s sermon notebook

NLS18721.Transcription:
Suich semblant crist sal makento þe aboueSuich as þu makest
                    her nou for his loue
NLS18721.Editions:
Wilson,  Edward. 
             A Descriptive Index of the English Lyrics in John of Grimestone’s
                Preaching Book.
Medium Ævum Monographs
         n.s. 2. Oxford, 1973: 16.
